subject: a problem with the shifter
description_text:
Hello from Greece,
 I am the owner of the SIMSONN PC 6+R H Gear Shifter for a year now.
(purchase date 6 Jan 2025).
Unfortunately last night i was not able to use the 2nd and 6th gear.  To be
precise, i cannot use the 2nd gear at all, but i can use the 6th gear if i
use a lot of force.
 Can you please help me to solve this problem?

thank you


--

conversations.body_text: Hi Michalis Catinas,  Could you please provide a video and share it with us via Google Drive, making sure the link access is set to viewable, so we can further review the issue?Â

So sorry, i made a mistake:
I mounted the shifter on my rig with taller screws than i should, and that
created the problem.
 I fixed it by using the shorter screws that you provided in the box.

Thank you for the quick reply and my apologies for taking up your time.
Cheers from Greece!
